ai_evaluation.summary: CryptoGarden is a platform that combines urban farming with blockchain technology. Users earn NFT badges for their gardening achievements, which can be traded or used to unlock discounts on eco-friendly products.
open_questions: How will the platform ensure the authenticity of photo submissions?
What is the plan for scaling up the IoT sensor verification system?
How will the value of the NFT badges be determined and maintained?

ai_evaluation.summary: DeFiLens is an AI-powered dashboard that aggregates data from major DeFi protocols to provide key metrics, real-time APY changes, and risk alerts. It aims to simplify DeFi analytics, making it more accessible for casual users and serving as a tool for risk management, yield optimization, and education.
open_questions: How does the AI-driven algorithm work in highlighting key metrics?
What measures are in place to ensure the accuracy of the data?
How does the platform handle sudden liquidity withdrawals or governance changes?

ai_evaluation.summary: ChainChat is a decentralized messaging service that uses blockchain technology for security and tokenized moderation. It offers end-to-end encryption, optional anonymity, and a self-regulating ecosystem to control spam and abusive content.
open_questions: How will the system ensure fair use of the upvote/downvote mechanism?
What measures are in place to prevent misuse of the anonymity feature?
How will the system handle scalability issues inherent to blockchain technology?
